price: Idan aka ce musu, "Ku yi sujada ga Mai rahama." Sai su ce: "Mene ne Mai rahama? Ashe zã mu yi sujada ga abin da kuke umurnin mu?"Kuma wannan (magana* ta ƙãra musu gudu.
arabic: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱسۡجُدُواْۤ لِلرَّحۡمَٰنِ قَالُواْ وَمَا ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ أَنَسۡجُدُ لِمَا تَأۡمُرُنَا وَزَادَهُمۡ نُفُورٗا۩
footnotes: * Kõ sun san gaskiyar abin daaka kira su zuwa gare shi, bã zã su yi ɗã'ã ba, dõmin wai sunã jin nauyi su karɓi umurni daga wani mutum.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā qīla lahumu us'judū lilrraḥmāni qālū wamā al-raḥmānu anasjudu limā tamurunā wazādahum nufūran
